page.title: 12GAMES CHILDREN PLAY 3
page.content: "Had" is a very energetic game, quite the opposite of {Space Invaders.}You gather round in a circle and put your foot in the middle. The person in charge of the game chants a rhyme that has been handed down by tradition to see who is "on it". In other words to see who is going to be catching. For example one rhyme is :- Eeny, meeny, miney, mo, Catch a tiger by the toe, If it screams let it go, Eeny, meeny, miney, mo. The person on whom the word "mo" lands is out so he or she are not "on it" and so on. The last person to have the word "mo" land on him is "on it". He runs after you and if he touches and shouts "had", he is released and you are "on it". This goes on until everybody is tired out and stops!
